Eye illustration indicating permission not granted.
Open Terms and Privacy Policy
The Continue button is disabled. Please grant camera access to proceed.
The Continue button now is enabled.
Explore the world in new ways, use AI to save and relive your memories.
Camera Access

Navigate to Memories on Google Drive.

Save memory.
Open eye, camera ready. Double tap to take a photo.
Closed eye, analysis complete. %s Double tap to return to the camera.
Eye moving, analyzing image. Please wait a moment.
Uploading memory to the cloud. Please wait a moment.
Memory uploaded successfully.
Flash, On. Double tap to activate.
Flash, Off. Double tap to activate.
Flash, Auto. Double tap to activate.
Showing, back camera. Double tap to activate.
Showing, front camera. Double tap to activate
Hello! I\'m here to help. Take a photo and I\'ll describe what I see for you. Just click the button below to get started.
Oops! Something went wrong
An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again.
Connection Error
Unable to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection and try again.
Analyze Error
An error occurred while analyzing the image. Please try again.
Upload Error
An error occurred while uploading. Please try again.
